comments:
To test eclipse 3.2 I've created sample project with single SWT class. I can run this class as "java bean" and as "Java Apllication" from eclipse ide without any problems. But when I generate ant script ("File"->"Exports"->"Ant Buildfiles") and try to run application manually I receive following error:
-------

This gives auto generated build script. Path to the swt jar is correct and jar contains corresponding dlls. Could you please see what is wrong?

Thank you for the bug report.
Could you attach your sample project?

Example Project

ant MainShell
